## Load Packages

```{r}

if(!require(librarian)){
  install.packages(librarian)
  library(librarian)
}

shelf(tidyverse, here, DBI, RPostgres, janitor, readxl, parsedate, stringr)

```

## Read in Data
```{r}

raw_qpcr <- read_csv(here("data", "panama", "qpcr", "panama_2022_bdswab.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names()

```

## Trim Fat
```{r}

skinny_qpcr <- raw_qpcr %>% 
  select(sample_name, bd_ct_mean, bd_quantity_mean, extraction_lab, q_pcr_lab, notes) %>% 
  rename(bd_swab_id = sample_name,
         average_ct = bd_ct_mean,
         averate_target_quant = bd_quantity_mean,
         qpcr_lab = q_pcr_lab,
         extract_lab = extraction_lab,
         comments = notes)

```

## Clean Table
```{r}

clean_qpcr <- skinny_qpcr %>% 

```
